column3: short_description
A leading Hong Kong-based blockchain gaming and web3 company, known for The Sandbox and NFT games.
Australian crypto-game studio building scalable blockchain games like Gods Unchained and Guild of Guardians.
UK-based mobile game developer focused on hyper-casual games, publishing on iOS and Android.
Ukrainian game development studio making web3 and Unity-based games, with a remote-first team.
Indie game development firm in Minnesota, small team building original multiplayer and indie titles.
The company behind Axie Infinity, pioneering in play-to-earn and blockchain-based game economies.
Web3 gaming studio building decentralized games where players actually own their in-game assets.
Blockchain company behind Flow blockchain and collectible games like NBA Top Shot.
Web3 RPG and auto-battler game studio, creating a high-fidelity blockchain-based game world.
Major mobile game studio behind GardenScapes, Township, known for large player base and deep user retention.
London-based mobile game developer, famous for Woodoku and hyper-casual titles; scaling rapidly.
Global game and engine company; creators of Unreal Engine, Fortnite; very large but relevant for enterprise.
Engine provider for many game companies; their tech is used by indie, mobile, and web3 studios.
Mobile game powerhouse developer of Clash of Clans, Brawl Stars, with huge user monetization expertise.
Finnish mobile game company behind Angry Birds franchise, large user base and proven monetization.
Augmented reality gaming company; known for Pokémon GO, building location-based multiplayer experiences.
Polish AAA game studio behind The Witcher and Cyberpunk; high production values and deep narrative games.
Global game publisher and developer across mobile, console, PC; very diverse portfolio.
Small independent game studio building real-time multiplayer mobile games focused on social mechanics.
Mobile game developer known for match-3 and casual games, very strong live operations.
Web3 gaming platform with its own blockchain, game marketplace, and play-to-earn titles.
Blockchain game company making a physics-based competitive game where players build arenas.
Web3 game developer focused on merging blockchain ownership with traditional gameplay mechanics.
Space-themed web3 gaming studio on Immutable X, building metaverse-style play-to-earn experiences.
Polish modding-as-a-service company, enabling mod tools for Unity/Unreal games. (branden.biz)
Swedish indie studio founded in northern Sweden, focused on experimental and narrative games.
Small Swedish game studio working on experimental mobile titles, low-budget but creative.
Swedish company making both games and cinematic interactive experiences, part of Nordic dev.
Engineering partner that builds Unity-based games for external partners and startups.
Indian game development firm specialized in Unity mobile, AR/VR, and cross-platform games
Developer platform & wallet + Web3 trading card game (Skyweaver); bridging dev tooling + game economy.
Play‑to‑earn hyper‑casual platform with >160 blockchain games on Polygon.
Multiplayer action‑RPG on Ethereum, built by veterans from Epic, Blizzard, Riot; player-owned assets.
South Korean developer making Nine Chronicles, running its own Heimdall blockchain.
Blockchain studio reviving Pixelmon IP, building mini‑games under Pixelmon, anime integration planned.
South Korean blockchain‑gaming studio turning casual mobile games into team‑based social + Web3 experiences.
No-code, 3D game-creation platform for multiplayer interactive content; founded by ex-Unity devs.
Very small indie studio (2 people) making tightly-designed action games, known for stylized gameplay.
Publisher for indie teams; supports small‑to‑mid‑sized game dev teams to bring their games to market.
Australian developer specialized in sports games (cricket, rugby, etc.), uses Unity and proprietary tech.
Spanish indie studio, historically made narrative and atmospheric games; recently faced business challenges.
Polish studio building web3 RPG Hunt Royale; very player-first Web3 design & NFT mechanics.
Platform + marketplace for PC games + web3; supports resales of games + blockchain integration.
On-chain virtual world (Decentraland) casino + wearables economy; owners can earn crypto via games.
Indie Unity studio based in Mumbai, focused on original and creative small‑team games.
Unity and VR/metaverse-focused studio from India — combining creative design + immersive tech.
Indian studio building motion‑control, AR‑fitness style Unity games.
Dehradun-based dev team working on AI‑simulated game systems using Unity.
Large Indian games company; runs many mobile titles, some Unity-powered; also invests in Web3.
Web3 game development company specializing in blockchain-based casual/social games.
Full-stack game and metaverse development studio; builds Unity, Unreal, and blockchain games.
Web3 game development studio doing client work on blockchain game titles, smart contracts + games.
Software & game studio building Web3 games, metaverse projects, and Unity-based titles.
Web3 agency building blockchain games, NFT platforms, and game-related dApps.
Web & mobile dev agency with a strong web3 gaming vertical; they build smart contracts + games.
Blockchain development firm doing game dev + DeFi integration + Web3 gaming products.
Small Web3 dev studio working on blockchain games, NFT drops, and decentralized experiences.
Nazara’s branch focused specifically on blockchain/NFT‑backed games in India and abroad.
Game dev studio in India doing Unity, Unreal, AR/VR, and Web3 gaming projects.
Indie dev team doing 2D/3D Unity games, narrative, pixel art, available for dev partnerships.
Open-world multiplayer MMO maker; previously built a physics-based online world; strong Unity heritage.
Web3 platform for game developers: builds tools, economies, NFT infrastructure for games.
Gaming guild + Web3 investor; invests in NFT game assets and supports play‑to‑earn guild members.
Web3 game studio building a turn‑based RPG in a richly crafted universe; NFT-powered characters.
Sci‑fi grand strategy MMO on blockchain with deep economy; built on Unreal + blockchain.
Indie Web3 game studio making blockchain-based play‑to‑earn games and metaverse projects.
Investment fund + dev organization that backs NFT gaming projects and builds play‑to‑earn titles.
Veteran studio (EVE Online), exploring web3 economy and persistent universe systems.
Developer of Palworld, recently launched a publishing arm for indie / web3 developers.
Indie studio partnered with Pocketpair Publishing for new horror game; focus on narrative + Web3.
Blockchain game studio building token‑driven social RPGs with on-chain economies.
Play‑to‑earn gaming platform combining DeFi and NFTs; mobile-focused with yield mechanics.
Blockchain-based metaverse game where players mine and govern planets in a DAO-like structure.
Blockchain RPG on Ethereum where players own heroes as NFTs and battle in strategic turn-based fights.
Infrastructure company that builds spatial simulation tools; exploring blockchain for virtual world persistence.
Crypto-game development studio; built polygon‑based games and Web3-native game dev.
Platform for building blockchain games + NFTs; provides SDKs for developers to integrate assets.
Blockchain platform for gaming and NFTs; powers many web3 games with low friction minting and trading.
Web3 gaming company building blockchain-native economies and player-owned assets for competitive games.
Cloud‑gaming platform blending traditional gaming and Web3 for streaming games and decentralized assets.
Mobile strategy blockchain studio; Heroes of Mavia is a flagship game built on Base.
Korean game company running WEMIX blockchain, building both traditional MMO and Web3 games.
HTML5 and mobile social game studio, working on lightweight multiplayer experiences.
Major publisher-developer; working on integrating blockchain for in-game asset ownership and trade.
Subsidiary of Animoca, working on mid-size Web3 and mobile titles.
Animoca Brands subsidiary, developing multiplayer games with potential blockchain integrations.
Edu‑gaming platform under Animoca Brands; exploring NFTs for educational in-game rewards.
Part of Animoca Brands, working on 3D racing or car‑themed titles with Web3 potential.
While Mojang is large, Notch team spinouts explore web3 via block-based game mechanics.
Small Web3 startup making crypto-collectible card games and play-to-earn titles.
Indie multiplayer studio focusing on social, co-op games; exploring NFT economies.
Canadian studio making narrative + strategy games; interested in web3 asset integration.
Small cross‑platform dev studio working on mobile/Web and exploring web3 side‑projects.
Social games company that recently explored blockchain collectibles in casual games.
Web3 game development studio building cross-chain P2E titles with strong UX.
Virtual world and VR game maker; building futuristic MMOs with blockchain-based land ownership.
Blockchain game incubator + dev studio; supporting gaming projects and infrastructure.
Web3 game hub + SDK provider enabling games to integrate blockchain rewards and NFT items.
Large mobile game publisher; experimenting with blockchain-based collectibles and player-owned items.
Merged Roblox‑based studios (RedManta + Sonar) — exploring web3/social play in virtual spaces.
Bangladeshi on-demand delivery, ride-sharing, and logistics platform expanding into e-commerce.
Leading online grocery delivery platform in Bangladesh with tech-first supply chain.
Bangladeshi e-commerce marketplace offering flash sales and tech-driven shopping experiences.
Bangladesh mobility platform integrating ticketing, ride-hailing, and e-commerce.
Bangladeshi online fashion retailer, providing curated apparel and accessories.
Global fashion brand selling premium denim, apparel, and e-commerce products.
Swedish fashion giant providing affordable clothing online and offline.
Europe-based online fashion marketplace offering multi-brand apparel and e-commerce solutions.
Luxury fashion e-commerce platform connecting consumers to high-end boutiques worldwide.
Bangladeshi e-commerce marketplace with diverse categories, including fashion and electronics.
Bangladeshi online shopping platform for fashion, electronics, and lifestyle products.
Bangladeshi marketplace offering fashion, electronics, and daily necessities online.
E-commerce giant operating in South Asia, with strong fashion, electronics, and logistics presence.
Amazon’s fashion vertical offering global apparel and e-commerce services online.
UK-based online fashion and cosmetics retailer, targeting young adults with global e-commerce.
Fast-fashion e-commerce platform selling affordable clothing globally, leveraging digital supply chain.
India-based fashion e-commerce platform offering apparel, footwear, and accessories.
Pan-African e-commerce platform selling fashion, electronics, and more online.
Bangladeshi fashion and lifestyle brand with e-commerce presence for clothing and accessories.
Bangladesh-based multi-industry company selling electronics, home appliances, and fashion online.
Pakistani textile and fashion brand selling apparel online, also shipping to Bangladesh.
Food and fashion delivery integrated e-commerce platform in Bangladesh.
European mobility and e-commerce platform, integrating fashion & services in app ecosystem.
Online fashion store selling women’s apparel and accessories worldwide.
American fast-fashion retailer offering clothing, footwear, and e-commerce globally.
Japanese fashion retailer with global e-commerce presence for apparel and lifestyle products.
Southeast Asia-based fashion e-commerce platform offering apparel and accessories.
Middle East online fashion store selling clothing, footwear, and accessories.
Bangladeshi fashion media + e-commerce platform selling curated apparel and accessories.
Bangladesh-based online fashion store for women’s clothing and accessories.
